desc.isekaiweaponryfabric.kannas_devilsp: Demon-hunting weapon from another dimension. Surprisingly, even in this universe, it can deal deadly §6§omagical§f§o blows to those §6§oundead creatures

desc.isekaiweaponryfabric.pan_doral_stor: A mysterious Orga-Lux weapon with terrifying abilities only §6§owhen user dual wield both of the Pan=Dora§f§o. After meeting the condition, use the ability to get §6§o「Pandora's Dance」§f§o and §6§o「Pandora's Vision」§f§o, §6§owhen both effects exist§f§o, on-hit attack reduces incoming attack damage and weakens target. §6§oWhen only one effect exists§f§o, on-hit attack slows target and grants user damage boost. §b§oCool Down§f§o: §6§o30 seconds

desc.isekaiweaponryfabric.razor_edge_sto: An ancient treasury magic weapon from a perished kingdom. Its attacks §6§odeal magic damage§f§o, that's why the blade can slice through armor like paper
desc.isekaiweaponryfabric.spuit_lance_st: A godly weapon crafted by those called Supreme-beings. On hit §6§oreturns a portion of the damage dealt to heal the wielder§f§o, with a §b§oCool Down§f§o of §6§o5 seconds§f§o. Due to its holiness, it §6§odeals more damage to undead creatures
desc.isekaiweaponryfabric.crescent_rose_: A weapon capable of §6§ofiring powerful bullets§f§o. After firing, it grants §6§oSpeed and Strength boost§f§o to its wielder for §6§o3 seconds§f. If the wielder use the skill §6§owhile crouching§f§o, then the recoil will §6§olaunch the wielder forward§f§o, also grants §6§ostronger Speed and Strength boost§f§o. §b§oCool Down§f§o: §6§o4 seconds
